item.title: BlinkOn9
item.description: I attended BlinkOn9 from April 18 to 19, 2019. Here is the official page: bit.ly/blinkon9-info, presentations, and Lightning Talks. At this conference, I talked about acelerating graphics performance with ozone-gbm on Intel based Linux desktop systems: explained what kind of hardware accelerations have been applied to Intel -basedÂ Chromebook and how we can use them on a Linux desktop. Here is a demo video on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CY7X6vWD_wo
